title: Cannon Balls 3D
description: Cannon Balls 3D is an exciting casual game that puts your aiming skills to the test. Wield the cannon to demolish all objects in your path, but beware, as you only have a limited number of cannonballs at your disposal. Plan your shots wisely to maximize the impact and clear each level. Can you skillfully bring down all the targets with the available cannonballs? Show off your precision and enjoy the thrilling challenge of Cannon Balls 3D!
